aboutpara:
I graduated from the University of Washington, Bothell, with a Bachelor of Arts in Business Administration - Marketing and Technology and Innovation Management.

Through my work experience and extracurricular activities, I have strengthened my interpersonal skills, developed a strong work ethic, and formulated a positive mentality that has shaped who I am. As opportunities open, I'm looking forward to developing new abilities and continuing to improve those I already have.

I'm currently enrolled in the University of Washington's full-time Coding Boot Camp learning how to develop front-end and back-end applications and work with React, JS, HTML, CSS, NodeJS, MYSQL, and socket.io. With these new skills and experiences, I hope to branch out into new and exciting fields!
